messages.subject: Re: zoo tycoon 1 or 2?

messages.messageBody:
--- In UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com, "nellebelle"
<nellebelle@c...> wrote:
> Jackie (9) has been playing a demo version of zoo tycoon. I'd like
to get her the full version, but can't decide between the old one or
the new one http://www.microsoft.com/games/zootycoon/
>
> Has anyone played both? Any feedback? Thanks!
>
> She and her friend have been letting the tigers out of the cages on
purpose. Those poor zoo guests...
>
> Mary Ellen
>
> [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

We love Zoo Tycoon! (My son, also 9, likes to let out the lions!)
We borrowed the Expanded version from our library -- I think it's
called the "Complete Collection" with Dinosaur and Marine Mania
expansion packs. You can let the dinosaurs out to eat the visitors
in the expanded version. There are some competing opinions at Amazon -
- and from people who have played both, so it's a pretty good
resource. If the links below don't work, just go to Amazon.com and
type in "Zoo Tycoon." You'll get the links to these pages.

Nancy

Link to Zoo Tycoon Complete Collection review at Amazon (cut and
paste):

http://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/tg/detail/-
/B0000A2TPE/qid=1102047684/sr=8-1/ref=pd_csp_1/103-1209212-3409439?
v=glance&s=videogames&n=507846


Link to Zoo Tycoon 2 review at Amazon (cut and paste):

http://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/tg/detail/-
/B000300HK0/qid=1102047684/sr=8-2/ref=pd_csp_2/103-1209212-3409439?
v=glance&s=software&n=507846

messages.subject: zoo tycoon 1 or 2?
messages.msgSnippet: Jackie (9) has been playing a demo version of zoo tycoon.  I d like to get her the full version, but can t decide between the old one or the new one
messages.messageBody:
Jackie (9) has been playing a demo version of zoo tycoon. I'd like to get her the full version, but can't decide between the old one or the new one http://www.microsoft.com/games/zootycoon/

Has anyone played both? Any feedback? Thanks!

She and her friend have been letting the tigers out of the cages on purpose. Those poor zoo guests...

Mary Ellen

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
